and egui.java

my egui.java file code:

import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“”, “”, “”
});
}
}

item.title: Trying to run rich client, but something wrong helpzzz
item.dc:creator: @elaohu elaohu
item.description:
@elaohu wrote:

hi all, im trying to run rich client, and i got the following:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: client.main([Ljava/lang/
String;)V
at EGUI.main(EGUI.java:11)
Press any key to continue . . .

eugi.main:::
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“”, “”, “”
});
}
}

help plz thx~~~
